00041 //Axis Definitions: Acceptable values are "X", "Y", or "Z"... Case Insensitive
00042 #define DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_LAT_AXIS              "LatAxis"
00043 #define DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_VERT_AXIS             "VertAxis"
00044 #define DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_DEPTH_AXIS            "DepthAxis"
00045 
00046 //Axis Inversions: Acceptable values are true or false
00047 #define DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_INVERT_LAT_AXIS       "InvertLatAxis"
00048 #define DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_INVERT_VERT_AXIS      "InvertVertAxis"
00049 #define DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_INVERT_DEPTH_AXIS     "InvertDepthAxis"
00050 
00051 //Scale Factor: Any float value larger than DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_TOLERANCE
00052 #define DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_SCALE                 "Scale"
00053 
00054 //Tolerance for the scale value
00055 #define DZ_AXIS_CONVERTER_TOLERANCE     0.00000000001f
00056

00058 {

00069     };

00074         Export
00075     };
